General.Name: Yindu Kitchen Equipment Co Ltd
General.Description: Yindu Kitchen Equipment Co., Ltd engages in the research, development, production, and sale of commercial catering equipment in China and Internationally. The company offers commercial refrigeration equipment, which include commercial refrigerators, display cabinets, cake cabinets, and ice machines; buffet equipment, such as buffet stoves, soup stoves, juice tripods, dining cars, serving plates, etc.; and kitchen equipment, which includes ovens, griddles, fryers, clay pots, etc. It offers its products under the Yindu Catering Equipment, ISA, and Five Arrows brands. The company was founded in 2003 and is based in Hangzhou, China.
